document_title: Difficulty breathing, shortness of breath: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Shortness of breath, sometimes described as “air hunger” or shortness of breath (Shortness of Breath)  is a fairly common respiratory problem. On average, 1 out of every 4 people who come to see a respiratory doctor has difficulty breathing. This symptom causes the patient to always be in a state of lack of oxygen, fatigue, chest tightness, difficulty breathing, and interrupted breathing.
According to Professor Ngo Quy Chau, shortness of breath and inability to breathe normally can range from mild to severe, from temporary to long lasting. Diagnosis and treatment need to correctly determine the cause of this phenomenon.
subsection_title: kho tho.json. What is shortness of breath?
